doctor.name: Dr. Mir Habibur Rahman

doctor.info: Dr. Mir Habibur Rahman is a senior dental surgeon of Chattogram with more than 50 years of experience in the field of dentistry. He obtained the prestigious Fellowship from International College of Dentists(USA). His qualification is BSc, BDS (Dhaka). He was a Former Head in the Department of Dentistry of Chittagong Medical College & Hospital. He is skilled at difficult tooth extractions, surgery of wisdom teeth, root canal treatment and general and cosmetic dental procedures. He provides high quality and international standard treatment to his patients at Habib Dental. Practicing hour of Dr. Mir Habibur Rahman at Habib Dental is 4.30pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday)

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Azom Khan
doctor.degree: BDS, MS (Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery), NST Fellow (Oral Cancer)
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Azom Khan is a highly experienced dental, oral and maxillofacial surgeon in Chattogram, with qualifications including BDS, MS (Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery), and NST Fellowship in Oral Cancer. He serves as a Professor in the Dental Unit at Chittagong Medical College Hospital. Dr. Khan specializes in treating a range of conditions such as oral cancer, facial trauma, jaw fractures, impacted teeth, cysts and tumors of the oral cavity, cleft lip and palate, and TMJ (temporomandibular joint) disorders. He offers expert surgical and non-surgical care for complex oral and facial conditions. His private consultations are available at the Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery & Orthodontics Center, located at Epic Divine (2nd Floor), CMC Main Gate, Panchlaish R/A, Chattogram, with visiting hours from 9am to 2pm and 4pm to 9pm.

chamber.address: Epic Divine (2nd Floor), CMC Main Gate, Panchlaish R/A, Chittagong

doctor.name: Dr. Tashrin Alam Soma
doctor.info: Dr. Tashrin Alam Soma is a caring and experienced dental surgeon and smile designer in Chittagong, specializing in cosmetic and restorative dentistry. She holds a BDS from Dhaka University and PGT in Conservative Dentistry & Endodontics, with advanced training in root canal treatment, smile design, cosmetic fillings, crown and bridge work, and teeth whitening. As a consultant dentist at Shan Dental, Chittagong, Dr. Soma offers comprehensive dental care for issues such as dental cavities, gum disease, tooth sensitivity, broken or missing teeth, and aesthetic concerns. She is dedicated to creating confident smiles through personalized and painless treatments. Patients can consult her at Shan Dental, 932/A Mehedibag (North to Max Hospital), from 10:00 AM to 1:00 PM and 4:00 PM to 9:00 PM daily. For expert dental care and cosmetic dentistry in Chattogram, Dr. Tashrin Alam Soma is a trusted name.

chamber.address: 932/A, Mehedibag (North to Max Hospital), Chittagong

doctor.name: Dr. Sheikh Md. Emad Uddin
doctor.info: Dr. Sheikh Md. Emad Uddin is a caring and experienced Oral and Dental Surgeon in Chattogram, specializing in Aesthetic Dentistry (Smile Design), Root Canal Treatment, and comprehensive oral health care. He completed his BDS from Chattogram International Dental College and received advanced training in aesthetic dental procedures, including smile makeovers and cosmetic restorations. Dr. Emad Uddin currently practices at Sheikh Dental Care, Halishahar, Chattogram, located at Sheikh Manjil (2nd Floor), House # 01, Road # 01, Lane # 14, Block-A, Bus Stand Mor, Halishahar, Chittagong.
